info.description: API server for Split Bill application - manage groups, bills, transactions, OCR receipt scanning, and payments
info.title: Split Bill API

get.description: Returns activities across all groups the authenticated user belongs to
Returns the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile (display name, avatar, bank info)

post.description: Verifies Firebase ID token and returns or creates the user

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific bill

put.description: Updates bill title, amount, splits, or category

get.description: Returns the list of all supported bill categories with labels, icons, and colors
Returns all groups the authenticated user is a member of

post.description: Creates a new group with the authenticated user as creator and first member
Joins a group using the group's invite code

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific group including member details

put.description: Updates group name, description, or currency. Only the group creator can update.

delete.description: Deletes a group. Only the group creator can delete.

get.description: Returns the activity feed for a specific group with optional limit
Returns the balance for each member in the group (positive = owed, negative = owes)
Returns all bills in a specific group

post.description: Creates a new bill in a group with split information

get.description: Generates a text or JSON summary of a group's bills and settlements for sharing

parameters.description: Export format: text or json (default text)
parameters.name: format

post.description: Adds a user to a group by user ID

delete.description: Removes a user from a group. Only creator or the member themselves can remove.

get.description: Returns optimized settlement suggestions to minimize the number of transactions
Returns comprehensive statistics for a group including spending, categories, and trends
Returns category spending breakdown and monthly trends for a group
Returns all pending (unconfirmed) OCR scans for the authenticated user

post.description: Scans a receipt image from a URL using OCR and extracts items
Scans a receipt from a base64-encoded image using OCR and extracts items
Confirms parsed OCR results, optionally edits items, and creates a bill from the scan
post.summary: Confirm OCR scan and create bill

get.description: Retrieves a previously scanned OCR result by ID
Returns the list of supported Vietnamese banks with IDs, names, codes, logos, and colors

post.description: Generates banking app deeplinks (Momo, ZaloPay, VNPay, etc.) and VietQR URL for payment

get.description: Returns payment information (bank accounts, preferred payment method) for a user

post.description: Generates a VietQR code image URL for bank transfer payment

get.description: Returns overall statistics for the authenticated user across all groups

post.description: Creates a new settlement transaction between two users in a group

put.description: Confirms a received payment. Only the recipient can confirm.

post.description: Uploads an image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP) with max 10MB size limit
Uploads a base64-encoded image (supports data URI format) with max 10MB size limit

get.description: Returns all transactions (debts) for the authenticated user across all groups

balance.description: positive = owed money, negative = owes money
